page.title: 16THE CHAPEL
page.content: The chapel was built in 1818 it is made of big stones. It has five rooms the kitchen, Sunday School room, main room, toilets and the hall way. We have lots of services and different preachers do it every week. The grave yard is opposite the chapel, Christine Hicks takes the Sunday School most of the time. We have youth club there sometimes, Mr. & Mrs. Priest take it. The Minister is called the Reverend David Hart. We have fellow_ship there every fortnight. I go to Sunday School and my friend Lucy used to go but she got a bit bored with it.
